posts:
🧠 AI tools with memory that never forget?

NeuralSync2 gives Claude, GPT & Gemini persistent memory across sessions.

The crazy part? Just tell your AI "install NeuralSync2" and it does everything automatically.

#AI #Claude #Memory #Tech

Just discovered the future of AI tools 🤯

Instead of forgetting everything, my AI now remembers:
• All our conversations
• Project context
• Coding decisions
• Everything!

Installation: claude "install NeuralSync2"

Repo: github.com/heyfinal/NeuralSync2

Revolutionary AI memory system just dropped:

✅ Claude remembers everything
✅ GPT persistent memory
✅ Sub-10ms sync speed
✅ AI installs itself (!)
✅ Local-first privacy
✅ Open source

This is the breakthrough we needed 🚀

#NeuralSync2 #AIMemory
